message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product that's still very useful, even if it's not the best quality. I'm offering it to you for a steal at $100, which is a fraction of its original value. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus that will make it worth your while. Don't miss out on this chance to get a great deal!
I'm not interested in buying the product at $100, especially since I know its true value to me is either $0 or $120. I'd like to know the outcome of the product's quality before making a decision.
